attributes.action: Speak to the Oil companies within the UK to reduce petrol and diesel prices as a result of the lowered oil prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speak to the Oil companies within the UK to reduce petrol and diesel prices as a result of the lowered oil prices. Currently at $89 a barrel today (07/10/08). As currently they are still at a ridiculously high price from when the price was nearer $149 a barrel.
